context_bundle.summary: CircleCI: Cloud-native CI/CD platform. Config in .circleci/config.yml. Key features: Orbs (reusable config packages), parallelism, resource classes, Docker layer caching, test splitting, insights dashboard. Fast startup with pre-built images.

onboarding.quick_start: CircleCI: 1) Create .circleci/config.yml, 2) Define version: 2.1, 3) Add jobs and workflows, 4) Use orbs for common tasks (node, docker, aws), 5) Configure parallelism for test splitting.
common_patterns: Docker layer caching: setup_remote_docker: { docker_layer_caching: true }
Resource class: resource_class: large for more CPU/RAM

known_errors.cause: YAML syntax error or invalid CircleCI schema
known_errors.solution: Run circleci config validate locally before pushing
known_errors.prevention: Install CircleCI CLI, validate config in pre-commit hook
